attributes.action: Introduce a law to force employers to give their employees an annual rate of inflation pay increase
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Businesses do not currently have any legal obligation to give employees an annual rate of inflation pay increase. In the current economic climate the cost of living has increased dramatically to the point where the average persons wage barely covers the essentials such as food and fuel. More and more families are struggling to cope and it is down to employers discretion whether or not this most basic pay increase will be given or not There needs to be a legal ohbligation for employers to increase employees pay by the rate of inflation in the interests of employee welfare.
